headline: Is It Too Late To Consider EMCOR Group (EME) After An 87% One Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether EMCOR Group's current share price still offers value, this article walks through the key signals that can help you judge where it stands today. With the stock closing at US$808.51 and returns of 14.1% over 7 days, 22.4% over 30 days, 26.6% year to date and 86.9% over 1 year, EMCOR Group has caught the eye of investors who watch both momentum and potential changes in risk perception. Recent coverage has focused on EMCOR Group as a major player in the capital goods...
